pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fast Symbolic Multivariate Polynomials // Fast manipulation of symbolic multivariate polynomials using the 'Map' class of the Standard Template Library. The package uses print and coercion methods from the 'mpoly' package (Kahle 2013, "Multivariate polynomials in R", The R Journal, 5(1):162), but offers speed improvements. It is comparable in speed to the 'spray' package for sparse arrays, but retains the symbolic benefits of 'mpoly'. To cite the package in publications, use Hankin 2022 doi:10.48550/ARXIV.2210.15991. Uses 'disordR' discipline.
